mapper.select: SELECT * FROM portfolio.career ORDER BY order_no DESC;

SELECT p.id, p.title AS title, (SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(image_path) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT image_path FROM portfolio.project_images WHERE project_id = p.id) AS image_paths) AS images, (SELECT JSON_ARRAYAGG(content) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT content FROM portfolio.project_texts WHERE project_id = p.id) AS project_texts) AS texts FROM portfolio.projects p LIMIT #{pageNo} OFFSET #{offset};
